description: This file is a C header file defining utility functions, macros, and constants related to Wi-Fi management components, including conversion functions, data list utilities, and time utilities. It declares external dependencies and provides safeguards for null pointers.

methods.name: freq_band_to_dpp_radio_type
methods.description: Converts a Wi-Fi frequency band enumeration to a DPP radio type.

methods.name: reporting_type_to_dpp_report_type
methods.description: Converts a reporting type enumeration to a DPP report type.

methods.name: survey_type_to_dpp_scan_type
methods.description: Converts a survey type enumeration to a DPP scan type.

methods.name: survey_type_to_str
methods.description: Returns a string representation of a survey type.

methods.name: neighbor_scan_mode_to_str
methods.description: Returns a string representation of a neighbor scan mode.

methods.name: str_to_dpp_chan_width
methods.description: Converts a string to a DPP channel width enumeration.

methods.name: radio_index_to_radio_type_str
methods.description: Converts a radio index to a string describing the radio type.

methods.name: get_ds_dlist_len
methods.description: Returns the length of a doubly linked list.

methods.name: get_real_ms
methods.description: Returns the current real time in milliseconds.

methods.name: timeval_to_ms
methods.description: Converts a timeval struct to milliseconds.

methods.name: rssi_to_above_noise_floor
methods.description: Converts RSSI to an estimate of above noise floor.

methods.name: get_ssid_from_vap_index
methods.description: Retrieves the SSID corresponding to a virtual AP index.
